quotes.quote: I’ll tell you what freedom is to me. No fear!
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: One is not born, but rather becomes, a woman.
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Greed has driven the world crazy. And I think I’m lucky that I have a place over here that I can call home.
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.quote: I was taught that the way of progress was neither swift nor easy
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: The truth is no one of us can be free until everybody is free
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: My saving grace was that I always knew when to leave the party.
quotes.author: Iman Abdulmajid

quotes.quote: Human rights are not things that are put on the table for people to enjoy. These are things you fight for and then you protect.
quotes.author: Wangari Maathai

quotes.quote: I have to constantly re-identify myself to myself, reactivate my own standards, my own convictions about what I’m doing and why.
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.quote: One is not born a genius, one becomes a genius.
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

quotes.quote: There are opportunities even in the most difficult moments.
quotes.author: Wangari Maathai

quotes.quote: The more you knows your story , the  more liberated you are
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Wisdom and prudence are always recompansed
quotes.author: Comptesse de Seguir

quotes.quote: To those who oppose us, we say, 'Strike the woman, and you strike the rock'.
quotes.author: Winnie Madikizela-Mandela

quotes.quote: I beleive that every person is born with a Talent
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: It is only when all black groups, join hands and speak with one voice that we shall be a bargaining force which will decide its own destiny.
quotes.author: Winnie Madikizela-Mandela

quotes.quote: When someone shows you who they are beleive them for the first time
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: You cannot hope to build a better world without improving the individuals. To that end, each of us must work for our own improvement.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: Have no fear of perfection you will never reach it
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: There comes a time when humanity is called to shift to a new level of consciousness . . . that time is now.
quotes.author: Wangari Maathai
